content: Quando il gatto non c'Ã¨ i topi ballano.
translations: eng:If the cat is outside, the mice dance on the table
eng:When the cat is away, the mice will play
eng:When the cat is blind, the mouse becomes bold
eng:When the cat's away the mice will play
eng:When the cat's away, the mice do play
eng:When the landlord's away, the tenants will play
